lyrics.text:
Ke fai ‘e māmani,
Mo hēvani foki,
‘A e hiva lelei,
Ko e fakafeta’i,
‘I he hoko ‘a e ‘Eiki,
Ko e tangata mo’oni.

Pea na’e tupu,
‘I he’etau anga,
Pea na’e fufū,
‘A hono ‘Otua,
Ko e tangata totonu,
Ko Imanuela ia.

Ko ‘ene fu’u ‘ofa,
Kia kitautolu,
‘Oku ma’olunga,
Pea mahu’inga,
Pea fakahā ‘i lalo,
Ko hotau ‘Otua ‘ofa.

Pea fekau ia
Ke tau loto liliu;
Pea fua ia,
Hotau laumālie,
Pea ke tau ma’u ‘i loto,
‘A hotau ‘Otua lelei.

Pea tau lava’i,
‘A e loto ma’a,
Ke tau teunga’aki,
Ki hono fofonga,
Pea ‘e toki fakahā,
Hono lahi ‘o e ‘ofa.
